Description:
Belle is a girl who is dissatisfied
with life in a small provincial
French town, constantly trying to
fend off the misplaced
"affections" of conceited Gaston.
The Beast is a prince who was
placed under a spell because he
could not love. A wrong turn
taken by Maurice, Belle's father,
causes the two to meet.
